title: Mauro Persiani
text:
Mauro Persiani (born November 15, 1956 in <a href="Bologna">Bologna</a>) is a retired <a href="Italy">Italian</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
The three games that he played for <a href="A.S.%20Roma">A.S. Roma</a> in the 1975/76 season were his only <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a> appearances. 
He hit the crossbar in the last minutes of Roma-Juventus .
